ModMetaData.name: More Vanilla Biomes
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Adds six new vanilla-friendly biomes.
Grasslands: Warm, with poor soil, lots of grass, and few trees.
Coastal Dunes: Low-lying sandy area with lots of water.
Sandbar: Smooth, flat, sandy islands with little if any vegetation or arable land. Warning: It is possible (though unlikely) to get a sandbar map with NO solid land!
Alpine Meadow: A beautiful area with fertile soil, lots of flowers, and few predators.
Oasis: Desert with groundwater close to the surface, forming small lakes and pockets of rich soil with thick vegetation.
Iceberg: Frigid chunks of ice floating on the ocean. Who would want to live here?
